title: John Thune elected Senate majority leader in a Trump presidency

title: Who is Pete Hegseth? Trump picks Fox News host for Defense secretary
shortDescription: Trump's pick of Hegseth for Defense secretary puts a Washington outsider at the front of the Pentagon. On his agenda: targeting woke issue, and women in combat.

title: Thune elected to succeed Mitch McConnell as Senate majority leader
shortDescription: John Thune, 63, defeated Sens. John Cornyn and Rick Scott in the secret-ballot vote to succeed Mitch McConnell as Senate majority leader.

shortDescription: It has been a century-old custom for the first lady to host tea with her successor.

title: Trump Cabinet picks: Here's who has been tapped for positions so far

title: Exxon Mobil CEO to Trump: Keep US in Paris climate agreement
shortDescription: Exxon Mobil CEO Darren Woods told the Wall Street Journal that the U.S. should stay in the Paris climate agreement under the incoming Trump administration.

title: Trump taps Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy to tackle government waste
shortDescription: The move comes after Musk became one of Trump's staunchest supporters, and biggest financial backers, during the last stage of his presidential campaign

title: Trump nominates Fox News host Pete Hegseth for Defense Secretary
shortDescription: Hegseth has worked at Fox News for eight years. He is an Army combat veteran who served in Guantanamo Bay, Iraq, and Afghanistan.

title: Trump picks former aide William McGinley as White House counsel
shortDescription: McGinley served in the first Trump White House and helped lead the Republican National Committee's election integrity team.

title: What can Biden get done before Inauguration Day?
shortDescription: Republicans will take control of the White House and the Senate after Inauguration Day. Until then, there are key things Democrats have left to do.

title: Donald Trump names former intelligence chief John Ratcliffe to CIA director
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump designated his former Director of National Intelligence John Ratcliffe, to become the director of the CIA.

title: If Trump taps Rubio for Cabinet, DeSantis to pick Senate replacement
shortDescription: If Marco Rubio is picked to be secretary of state, Gov. Ron DeSantis would pick his replacement in the U.S. Senate.

title: Trump taps Mike Huckabee to be US ambassador to Israel
shortDescription: Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to be U.S. ambassador to Israel.
